comment: Our st Singles ' Fellowship Meeting kicks off in less than hours ! . We hope you are making your way down already . __ Reposted from . It's our first service for the year <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Our st Singles ' Fellowship Meeting kicks off in less than hours ! . We hope you are making your way down already . __ Reposted from . It's our first service for the year <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (k / kick-off-04
            :mode expressive
            :ARG1 (m2 / meet-03
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Fellowship"
                        :op2 "Meeting")
                  :poss (w / we))
            :time (a / after
                  :op1 (n2 / now)
                  :quant (l / less-than
                        :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (h / hour)))))
      :snt2 (h2 / hope-01
            :ARG0 (w2 / we)
            :ARG1 (m3 / make-19
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (w3 / way
                        :poss y
                        :direction (d / down))
                  :time (a2 / already)))
      :snt3 (r / repost-01
            :ARG0 (w4 / we))
      :snt4 (s / serve-01
            :ARG0 (w5 / we)
            :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                  :value 1)
            :time (y2 / year)))

comment: Join Pastor this monday th of January for a wonderful service tagged " VALUE SHIFT " . Time : pm Venue : The Fountain of life church , Ilupeju , Lagos .
amr:
# ::snt Join Pastor this monday th of January for a wonderful service tagged " VALUE SHIFT " . Time : pm Venue : The Fountain of life church , Ilupeju , Lagos .
(j / join-04
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (p2 / pastor)))
      :ARG2 (s / serve-01
            :ARG1-of (w / wonderful-03)
            :ARG1-of (t / tag-01
                  :ARG2 (n / name
                        :op1 "Value"
                        :op2 "of"
                        :op3 "Life"
                        :op4 "Church")
                  :location (c / city

                              :op1 "Ilupeju")
                        :location c
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Lagos"))))
      :time (d / date-entity
            :weekday (m / monday)
            :dayperiod (n4 / night)
            :mod (t2 / this)))
